text: Chow Hang Tung (Cantonese: 鄒幸彤; born 24 January 1985) is a Hong Kong lawyer and politician. == Early life and education == Chow studied physics at University of Cambridge. Chow found out that human rights issues were her real interest, so she gave up doctoral studies and went back to Hong Kong. She then studied law at the University of Hong Kong. == References == Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:Living people Category:1985 births
title: Chow Hang Tung
